verbose_text: The caspase-3/7 activity induced by serum starvation in TAMH cells was significantly decreased when the cells were treated with IGF-I, indicating an anti-apoptotic and pro survival effect of IGF-I (XREF_FIG).
evidence: caspase-3/7 activity induced by serum starvation in TAMH cells was significantly decreased when the cells were treated with IGF-I, indicating an anti-apoptotic and pro-survival effect of IGF-I
